dataList.eventDesc:
Мы вновь ступили на порог Кадрового Отдела.

Согласно Руководству по Трудовому воспитинаю, чтобы пережить ударную волну Фиолетового Полудня, нам необходима Защита от физического воздействия.

Мы встали в коридоре, поближе прижавшись друг к другу и вспоминая то, что сказала нам Ход, Сфирот Кадрового Отдела. Спустя недолгое время нас пронзили те же пули, что и раньше.

Вокруг тех Грешников, что были поражены пулями, начали образовываться красные защитные поля.

'Так… Если верить расписанию, у нас ещё есть время до появления следующего Полудня.'

Кто-то из Грешников заметил размещённое на стене Руководство действий в чрезвычайных ситуациях.

В нём была изложена инструкция по использованию установленной в вестибюлях консоли управления, с помощью которой можно было активировать Систему Регенерации, что была подключённа к Отделу Безопасности.

'Стоит попытаться.'

Если поторопимся, у нас может получиться активировать Систему Регенерации до появления Полудня.
successDesc:
После прочтения инструкции у {0}(а) засветилось лицо.

Вскоре уведомление даёт нам знать, что Различитель Системы Регенерации был откоррективирован, возобновляя большую часть функций Системы Регенерации.
failureDesc:
После продолжительного перечитывания Руководства лицо {0}(а) поникло во тьме.

Должно быть, даже столь усердное вглядывание в его страницы не приносило никаких результатов…

…и в конце концов {0}(у) удалось восстановить основные функции Системы Регенерации.
До следующего Испытания осталось слишком мало времени.

Больше нельзя тратить его на возьню с этой консолью управления. Мы вернулись в вестибюль.

successDesc:
Looking through the webs reveals… small spiders crawling within.

And that they were no mere spiderweb.

The darkness that devoured the floor lights up, red eyes glowing and teeming.

[{0}] manages to tear their eyes away from the red eyes and begin observing the fizzling generator. Thankfully, it doesn't take much time before a malfunctioning part is identified.

[{0}] carefully removes the malfunctioning part…

… and all of a sudden, the generator stops fizzling, and the door of the containment unit slams shut.

Spiders begin crawling onto [{0}].
failureDesc:
Looking through the webs reveals… small spiders crawling within.

And that they were no mere spiderweb.

The darkness that devoured the floor lights up, red eyes glowing and teeming.

[{0}] manages to tear their eyes away from the red eyes and begin observing the fizzling generator. Thankfully, it doesn't take much time before a malfunctioning part is identified.

[{0}] yanks out the malfunctioning part, and the containment unit echoes with a heavy, resounding noise.

A few spiders, spooked by the noise, lunge and bite at the Sinners.

successDesc:
'It is a terrible strategy to mess with gas you don't know the effects of! I say that we leave the gas and take only the Enkephalin.'

'Hmph, you don't know what you're blathering about.'

The Sinners soon split into two parties and begin arguing with one another.

When the argument began to turn into an extended debate, [{0}] picked up both the Enkephalin and the gas canister.

'I should've just done that from the get-go instead of letting you guys waste time at loggerheads.'

We must've wasted too much time in there.

Upon exiting the corridor, we're greeted by a giant something rushing in our direction from where we were earlier.

We quickly ran the other way.
failureDesc:
'It is a terrible strategy to mess with gas you don't know the effects of! I say that we leave the gas and take only the Enkephalin.'

'Hmph, you don't know what you're blathering about.'

The Sinners soon split into two parties and begin arguing with one another.

When the argument began to turn into an extended debate, [{0}] picked up both the Enkephalin and the gas canister.

'Mm. Our departure was overly delayed.'

We must've wasted too much time in there.

Upon exiting the corridor, we're greeted by a giant something rushing in our direction from where we were earlier.

It's too late to run.

successDesc:
[{0}] prays before the skull.

To whom they pray, we cannot hear.

For what they pray, we cannot hear.

We cannot know if that even was a prayer, in this place of unholiness.

Gaze of judgment cascades from the hollows of the Skull's eyes.

It makes a threatening noise from time to time, snapping its teeth together, but [{0}] remains calm, certain that the Skull will not hurt them.

Once the pious ritual was over, a solitary scarecrow stands in the place of the great Skull, showering in the mysterious light.
failureDesc:
[{0}] prays before the skull.

To whom they pray, we cannot hear.

For what they pray, we cannot hear.

We cannot know if that even was a prayer, in this place of unholiness.

Gaze of judgment cascades from the hollows of the Skull's eyes.

It makes a threatening noise from time to time, snapping its teeth together. [{0}] nervously glances at the skull, shuddering lightly from worry.

Once the pious ritual was over, a solitary scarecrow stands in the place of the great Skull, showering in the mysterious light.

dataList.behaveDesc: Which Sinner will loudly convey their will?
successDesc:
[{0}] begins to recite before the skull.

We cannot hear the contents of their recital, but it is calm and honest, as though they are confessing their sins.

A ray of light showers over [{0}], though there is no opening in the ceiling.

When the light hits [{0}], a crown of thorns, the same crown worn by the skull, lands itself above their head.

When [{0}]'s recital ends, every Sinner closes their eyes with a peaceful expression.
failureDesc:
[{0}] begins to recite before the skull.

We cannot hear the contents of their recital, but it is calm and honest, as though they are confessing their sins.

A ray of light showers over [{0}], though there is no opening in the ceiling.

When the light hits [{0}], a crown of thorns, the same crown worn by the skull, lands itself above their head.

[{0}] briefly writhes in pain as the thorns of the crown begin digging into their scalp; but the pain is transient.

After a moment passes, [{0}] closes their eyes as their expression lightens, as though they came to a certain realization.
